de.mpa.client.ui

Class ComponentTitledBorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mpa.client.ui.ComponentTitledBorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, EventListener, Border

    public class ComponentTitledBorder
extends Object
implements Border, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener
    Custom titled border capable of displaying an embedded component.
    Based on Santhosh Kumar's implementation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ComponentTitledBorder(JComponent comp, JComponent container)
      Creates a default titled border with the specified component painted on top.
      ComponentTitledBorder(JComponent comp, JComponent container, Border border)
      Creates a component titled border with the specified component painted on top of the specified border underneath.
